articles.content: 2020 has been a cracking year for VR, and with the massive amount of power gaming PCs have gotten with new CPUs and GPUs, there’s never been a better time to experience games like Half-Life: Alyx or … [+2890 chars]

articles.title: Loneliness 'feels like being in a grave' - BBC News
articles.description: Sophie from Huddersfield sought help to overcame loneliness.
articles.content:
Sophie was so lonely she felt like life was "not worth living" until she got help from a local charity. Platform 1 in Huddersfield helps people dealing with isolation. 
If you or someone you know is… [+256 chars]
